name: One Man For 4 Jobs
description:
Game made for the GMTK Jam 2019 edition, on Unity 2019.2, with me Steve 'Gridord' Delgrange as the programmer and Arthur 'Acartes' Llorens as the artist.

The game is about managing 4 Jobs at the same time. Go to a job to start working and when a warning appear somewhere, go there to avoid being spotted not working !
